```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(dplyr)
```

## Plotting

```{r plotting1}
ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x=disp,y=mpg)) +
  geom_point(color = 'blue') +
  labs(title = "Displacement vs MPG", x = "Displacement", y = "MPG")

```
